channel.title: Ansible on Standing DevOps
channel.description: Recent content in Ansible on Standing DevOps

item.title: An ansible role for Anchor CMS
item.description: What you can learn from this post How to install Anchor CMS How to write an ansible role ready for Ansible Galaxy What we want to do In broad strokes, this is what we want to do: Update your system apt-get update && apt-get upgrade Install the required packages apt-get install unzip vim apache2 libapache2-mod-php5 mysql-server php5-curl php5-mcrypt php5-gd php5-mysql Secure your mysql install
